answers.answer: Plenty of women make it far enough to have a healthy baby while having preeclampsia. You'll probably just be put on bed rest. Don't stress so much, you'll be fine (:

I had preeclampsia at 28 weeks, horrible headaches, protein in urine, really high blood pressure, and swelling. Was put on bed rest had to deliver at 30 weeks baby had to stay in the NICU. His now 2 and doing great. Don't stress to much and think positive.
Stupid phone posted before I could even type lol. But my mom had preclampsia and delivered at 33 weeks but just couldn't breastfeed due to it but I have a happy healthy little brother now

question: I've been in the hospital for two days now monitoring my blood pressure. It's been high, going up and down. No protein in urine but I have swelling. They're afraid I may have preeclampsia. But I am only 24 weeks :( are my baby and I going to be safe? I know it requires early delivery, but are we even able to make it that far? I don't want anything happening to my baby :(
title: Any of you have preeclampsia before?
